objectives.en: the Masters student is able to demonstrate both their theoretical knowledge and the lessons learned from their hands on experience during an internship.
objectives.et: võimaldada magistrandil demonstreerida teoreetiliste teadmiste ja praktikal omandatud teadmiste seostamisoskust.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) can connect theoretical knowledge with the knowledge acquired in practice;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) oskab seostada teoreetilisi teadmisi praktikal omandatud teadmistega;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can analyse her/himself as a teacher;
5) possesses the knowledge of research methods in pedagogy and is able to compose his/her own scientific text;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) omab teadmisi uurimismeetoditest pedagoogikas; oskab praktikas leida konkreetses õppeaines pedagoogilistele ja psühholoogilistele probleemidele lahendusi ning põhjendada nende otstarbekust;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) can find solutions to the problems of a pedagogical and psychological nature and provide their reasoning during a pedagogical internship in a specific subject;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) valdab teksti uurimismetoodikat ja oskab ise luua teaduslikku teksti.
